ðŸ“– Summary: Blue95 is a Linux distribution based on Fedora Atomic Xfce, themed to resemble Windows 95. It offers an immutable, image-based system with automatic updates and pre-installed codecs, providing a nostalgic yet modern computing experience. Installation is primarily intended through rebasing from another Fedora Atomic desktop.
